mutants.code:
def count_valid_shifts(N, W):
    max_sweetness = max(W)
    start_index = W.index(max_sweetness)
    end_index = len(W) - 1 + W[::-1].index(max_sweetness)
    mid_index = N // 2
    valid_shifts = N - end_index - (mid_index - start_index)
    return max(0, valid_shifts)

def count_valid_shifts(N, W):
    max_sweetness = max(W)
    start_index = W.index(max_sweetness)
    end_index = (len(W) - 1) * W[::-1].index(max_sweetness)
    mid_index = N // 2
    valid_shifts = N - end_index - (mid_index - start_index)
    return max(0, valid_shifts)

    mid_index = N / 2
    valid_shifts = N - end_index - (mid_index - start_index)
    return max(0, valid_shifts)
